extendedInfo.description: 80s Cartoon Soundboard: He-Man! Bring back Saturday Morning, 1980's style!!  18 He-Man sound clips from the 80s cartoon show.  6 ringtone ready clips (3 Versions of the opening theme: Normal, Instrumental & Piano, MoTU Trailer, X-Mas Special theme. and the ULTRA rare "He-Man" by rap legend Ludacris!) PLUS 12 great notification clips including both the long and short version of "I Have the Power!"80s Cartoon Soundboard: He-Man! is the FIRST soundboard on the market that is fully controllable using user defined gestures!!!No more looking at the screen to hit the right button, just draw your gesture and the clip will play!All clips can be set as Ringtones, Notifications and now Alarms!  Wake up just like you did in the 80s!To set a ringtone, notification, alarm or gesture, LongPress on the desired clip and select the desired option.  (Note: Ringtones, Notifications, and Alarms require SD Card)Gestures can be deleted by LongPressing them on the gesture list.We have other modules that will work with this soundboard so you will be able to swipe left and right between your installed 80s Cartoon Soundboards!  No more having to exit the app, open the launcher and opening the next soundboard.Compatible 80s Cartoon Soundboards:80s Cartoon Sb: Themes! 80s Cartoon Sb: Thundercats (Explict Language)80s Cartoon Sb: TMNT!80s Cartoon Sb: Tranformers!80s Cartoon Sb: Tranformers PRO!80s Cartoon Sb: Voltron!80s Cartoon Sb: Voltron PRO! +more coming soonApp2SD compatible (Android 2.2+ Froyo required) takes just 236k on device.  (NOTE:  If external memory is too slow, the follow issues may occue: sounds only play for 1-2s, or you get an Application Not Responding error.  If this happens more the app over to internal memory)Permissions required and why:WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - Write ringtones, notifications, and alarms to sdcard so they are available to the system.WRITE_SETTINGS - Set ringtone, notification or alarm as the active system ringtone/notification/alarm.INTERNET - Show AdsACCESS_NETWORK_STATE - Show Ads
